product_name: The North Face Chunky Knit Visor Beanie
long_description: The North Face Chunky Knit Visor beanie not only delivers the warmth you need, it keeps snow and sun out of your eyes as well. Soft acrylic knit offers excellent warmth; it also breathes well when you're active and dries quickly when damp.
short_description: The North Face Chunky Knit Visor beanie not only delivers the warmth you need, it keeps snow and sun out of your eyes as well.
